frontmatter.title: Configuring ECS console To collect metrics and traces using ADOT
frontmatter.description: This blog post provides a walk-through of the ADOT test framework (https://github.com/aws-observability/aws-otel-test-framework) and an example for adding an integrated test case using the framework. In order to add new components to ADOT collector, it is required to include end-to-end integrated test cases. This blog post will discuss how and why this framework helps contributors add test case into ADOT Collector.
